tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I have a very long relationship with D.Sathya Prakash. I have known, been consulting him for last 11 years for various health issues/injuries. I first met doctor for ACL tear, I had to undergo a surgery for this and trust me to this date I have never faced issues post the surgery and I do everything what I used to before the ACL tear. The experience, recommendation, suggestion and guidance provided during the surgery was way more than what I could expect. Doctor was very patient in explaining everything in detail that even to this date if somebody comes to with me an ACL tear I explain it to them what happens, how it goes and how my experience was.. So it's now 11 years post the surgery and everything is normal as before. After this I have consulted him numerous times, one of the experience I would like to share is with regards to the disc bulge issue, to keep it short, he is far better than any other doctor's because his treatment really helped me and after that I have never had issues which is really rare compared to the other people who I have known had had similar issues. . ****** ** **** ************* ** ***** *** **** ***** **** *** ********** ** ********* ***** ***** *** **** ***** ** ******* *** ****** I have referred a lot of my friends and it is the similar story with them as well. ** ** *** **** **** ** ***** *** *** **** ********* ** ***** ***** ** ***** he identifies the issues and recommends us to the right specialists. With all these, Doctor Sathya Prakash has not just been a doctor but a good friend who is just like an extended family. BWVishnu

Dr gave a clear and simple explanation of his process to reach diagnosis, recommend tests and followed up with me regarding next steps. 

Very professional and strong communicator which is a major advantage for his patients.

A thorough gentleman and highly courteous. Was able to immediately diagnose the underlying issue and recommended medications both for immediate pain suppression and long term healthcare.

I came with severe/unbearable pain in my foot and was unable to put any sort of pressure, the doctor was able to quickly understand and suggested that he is suspecting high levels of Uris acids in my body and gave a simple blood test and a pill. Worked wonders and now I am pain free.

Thank you.

Also, in past he has treated my wife for her slip disc problem and my mother for her foot bone problem. Again was highly effective in his treatments and healthcare recommendations.

First of all he was too busy with his mobile( on a call) while i was there inside. Secondly he has prescribed MRI for my wrist problem which i did promptly at a place of my convenience, he had a problem with that. He was complaining saying I did not go to the place where he has recommended ( which he dint ). From the moment he saw that the MRI was done from a different place his tone and speech changed and he was least bothered to even look into the scan report.  Finally did i get the solution for my issues- NO-. I would suggest not to visit this place.

tags: Value for money,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
‚ÄúI was beyond impressed with my experience at this doctor's office. My first contact was with Dr.sathya Prakash and I was completely blown away by how helpful and kind he was and how fast he was at getting back to me! A lot of doctor's don't realise how important it is to have a good friendly relationship with patents and helping them in a good manner so that they would get satisfied.

Now on to the appointmen....my appointment ran on time ,** ****** ******* *** ****** ************* *** made me feel comfortable throughout the appointment! He explainede me each and every pros and cons of femur fracture. He helpede me in such a way that I'm able to walk now I'm feeling very nice about it all thanks to Dr.
Sathya ptakash .... I would highly recommend this Doctor and this medical group!‚Äù

Patient : KAMRAN RAJ.
Very friendly patient and careful in treating patients.  **** *** **** *********** ************ *** cares about not making patient spend unnecessarily as well.

He is the first individual I had visited first with lower back pain. Had the doctor diagnosed the lower back pain appropriately I would have not been having the L4-L5 herniated disc protrusion today. I request the doctor to listen to the patients first.. 

Please hide your pen and prescription book before you look at the patient. For any pain, you first prescribe pain killers. Pain killers can also be subscribed by the Pharmacists. What is the difference between you and the Pharmacists? You are there to listen and look at the patients condition, do an appropriate diagnosis. 

Please understand that over and wrong prescriptions is killing citizens of India and reducing the productivity of India. Be responsible in treating the patients, as there are more deaths due to doctors negligence than natural deaths.

I consulted him for my knee pain. He easily diagnosed the problem and have tablets. He suggested to take x-ray, if pain is not reduced after one week also. It got cured within a week. 
Clinic is small, but who cares about clinic size.
Appointment starts on time. Even if you reach early you have to wait for till ur appointment time. I would suggest you to go on time.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: He is one of the most friendly, helping and patient concerned doctor which is rare these days! I visited him for my mother's right hand wrist and thumb joint pain, he not only performed a surgery but also helped us recovering post surgery. In case if emergency we were able to reach him through phone and patiently handled all our concerns! Definitely recommended doctor.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I have visited him 2 times ...second time I clearly mentioned pain is getting severe... still he gave me b12 and vitamin D tablets and injections total of 1200 for 2 months . still trusting his reviews and behaviour I took them for 2 months . * **** *** ***** * ****** * * *** **** **** ******* Very much disappointed **  * ******* ** *** * **** *** * *** **** ********* ** **** ******* ****** ******** ****** We should not judge by 1 case but I would suggest to avoid the doc!! - Shiva

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Orthopedic Physiotherapy,Knee Pain Treatment,Lower Back Pain,Heel Pain,
review: For all the above health issues i had met him, he do the right checking where we have pain or difficulty in movement. He identifies the right issue and then only ask us to go for x-ray/mri/blood test. The problem has always been identified and explained well to me along with giving appropriate medication. The physiotherapy he provides at Eshwar Clinic is the BEST. I liked doctor's friendliness. He never did promotional content of any matter and it's very respectful.

We did not get to meet the doctor. A lot of people had been called at the same time and there is no reception or a compounder to manage things. One lady was stand ing there who was just telling everyone to wait but had no idea for how long. I cannot provide feedback for the doctor as I couldn't meet him, only for the experience which was very bad. 0 stars.

The doctor greeted me very politely and from there on I discussed my problem with him. He did the usual check up and since my problem was not anything major he prescribed medicines and asked me to visit him on Wednesday for physiotherapy  if the pain persists.  I am hoping my pain will subside with just the medicines.

Good doctor who patiently hear all our health complaints and then does his diagnosis very thoroughly. He doesn't unnecessarily prescribe drugs instead advise exercises, advice's appropriate food and list out food items that are to be totally avoided to arrest further aggravation of your complaints. He is very professional in his approach and recommend him for others. wish the doctor the best.
Simple affordable solutions. Focus on exercise rather than medicine and surgery. Highly recommend if you have flat feet issues.
Precise questioning and identification of issue and root cause. Clear treatment plan enabling the patient to recover quickly. Good doctor.
Doctor Sathya was very patient and polite in listening to every problem. His pain cause analysis sounds very confident and doesn't recommend additional treatment unless necessary.

Visited for left leg fracture and he clearly explained and concluded there is no fracture.
Thanks

review: Thorough and informative. He did not over prescribe which was a relief. Was willing to start a course of treatment and wait to see the results before taking severe measures.

explaining about the issue in a cool way, ver polite giving proper guidance so that we not getting panic.

He was crisp and clear in his explanation, and his prescriptions are working for me. He suggested rest and medication before deeper investigation (if problems persist) which I found was a prudent and right course of action while approaching my problem. 
He also ensured he had checked all parameters of possible serious issues in order to isolate what to address.

Very good doctor, he is patient friendly, gives confidence to patient **** ****** ********** I highly recommend him for back pain

I experienced severe shoulder pain after a fall. Dr Satya Prakash immediately requested an X-ray and diagnosed a fracture.

I strongly recommend Dr Prakash.

Really sweet doctor. Very patient and friendly. Explained the problem very well. I felt very good after his diagnosis. Will definitely keep him as my go-to for ortho related issue.
